name: NSColorRenderingIntent
desc: Constants that specify how Cocoa should handle colors that are not located within the destination color space of a graphics context.

items.name: case `default`
items.desc: Use the default rendering intent for the graphics context.

items.name: case absoluteColorimetric
items.desc: Map colors outside of the gamut of the output device to the closest possible match inside the gamut of the output device.

items.name: case relativeColorimetric
items.desc: Map colors outside of the gamut of the output device to the closest possible match inside the gamut of the output device.

items.name: case perceptual
items.desc: Preserve the visual relationship between colors by compressing the gamut of the graphics context to fit inside the gamut of the output device.

items.name: case saturation
items.desc: Preserve the relative saturation value of the colors when converting into the gamut of the output device.
